CompileError
    at packages/translator-default/test/fixtures/error-await-tag-missing-provider/template.marko:1:2
    > 1 | <await>
        |  ^^^^^ You must provide a promise argument to the "<await>" tag, eg: "<await(promise)>".
      2 |   <@then|result|>
      3 |     ${result}
      4 |   </@then>
